H0.text: More than 75% of the electromagnetic spectrum is visible light.

H1.text: 50% is the approximate percentage of the electromagnetic spectrum that is visible light.

H2.text: 25% is approximately the percentage of the electromagnetic spectrum that is visible light.

H3.text: Less than 10% of the electromagnetic spectrum is visible light.

A4.text: Two-photon absorption - a method for seeing outside the visible spectrum
